item.title: Meticulous Editor to Proof Text on Video Classes - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for a meticulous editor to proof videos of my online classes for spelling and grammar typos of the editor. Must be detailed and available to proof the videos this week effective immediately.

item.title: Videographer/Editor for Testimonials in Tampa, Florida - Upwork
item.description:
TAMPA Videographer Needed:  

Videographer needed to film two brief, in-person corporate interviews/ commentaries.
10:00am, July 19th 2024 at Tampa General Hospital.    
                    
Finished videos will be used in corporate social media and website posts.  
2-3 hours for shooting max. and  some editing involved.  

Video, lighting and audio equipment required.  

Hourly Range: $30.00-$75.00
Posted On: June 25, 2024 14:40 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:People, Videography, Video Editing, Video Production
Skills: People, Videography, Video Editing, Video Production
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States

item.title: UGC Style Video for B2B Service - Upwork
item.description:
GENERAL
We are seeking a talented individual to create a self-recorded, UGC-style video explaining how our B2B service has helped you hire virtual assistants and grow your business 10x more quickly than you would have otherwise.

PROJECT DETAILS
- Video Length: 15-20 seconds max
- Style: Authentic and sincere, not overly edited or polished
- Platform: The video should feel native to Instagram and Facebook
-  Create a self-recorded video
- Highlight 5-10 key points provided by us
- Develop a script that feels true and authentic to your voice

REQUIREMENTS
- Ability to produce high-quality, authentic self-recorded videos
- Familiarity with creating content for social media platforms like Instagram and Facebook
- Strong communication skills to convey the key points effectively

Budget: $100
Posted On: June 25, 2024 14:35 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:UGC, Social Media Content Creation, Explainer Video
Skills: UGC, Social Media Content Creation, Explainer Video
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply
